      • User

        public User(java.lang.String pName,
            int pScore,
            int pRound)
        Constructs new user with given name, score and round. Generally used for parsing high scores from text file.
        Parameters:
        pName - given name of the player
        pScore - given score that the player has
        pRound - given round that the player on
